settings.heading: K400 Variable Speed Blender with Tamper
settings.textarea: The K400 variable speed blender features a 3-part blending system that easily blends even the toughest ingredients, from kale to almonds and more, with a powerful vortex created by the ribbed jar design, unique asymmetric blade that blends at four distinct angles, and Intelli-Speed® Motor Control, which senses contents and maintains the optimal speed to power through all ingredients.

settings.heading: Keep Your Laundry Under Control
settings.textarea: Daily life can be messy when your family is always on the go. Whirlpool® washer and dryer innovations help you skip steps in your routine and keep up with laundry from anywhere. Our innovative laundry features help you wash more in a single load. Browse our full selection of washer and dryer options that’ll help you get laundry done faster, so you can spend more time making messes instead of cleaning up after them.

settings.heading: KitchenAid Licuadora K400 de Velocidades Variables
settings.textarea: El rendimiento para ofrecer el sabor perfecto para cada mezcla. El sistema de licuado de 3 partes de la licuadora de velocidad variable K400 mezcla fácilmente incluso los ingredientes más duros para obtener una textura uniforme. El diseño de la jarra acanalada crea un poderoso vórtice, empujando los ingredientes hacia la cuchilla asimétrica única que corta en cuatro ángulos distintos, asegurando que sus ingredientes se mezclen completamente.

settings.text: The K400 variable speed blender features a 3-part blending system that easily blends even the toughest ingredients, from kale to almonds and more, with a powerful vortex created by the ribbed jar design, unique asymmetric blade that blends at four distinct angles, and Intelli-Speed® Motor Control, which senses contents and maintains the optimal speed to power through all ingredients.

Historia

Somos una empresa que cuenta con mas de 14 anos en el mercado, especializados en la venta de electrodomesticos y productos para el hogar de las mejores marcas del mercado nacional e internacional.

settings.title: Busca preguntas frecuentes?
settings.text: Para preguntas generales, le recomendamos que consulte primero nuestra sección de preguntas frecuentes útiles y útiles. Es probable que haya una respuesta esperándote allí.
settings.label: Ver ahora

settings.title: ¿Cómo puedo cambiar o cancelar mi pedido de innovar.com.ve después de que se haya enviado?
settings.text:
Tenemos a su disposición el correo electrónico contacto@innovar.com.ve donde gustosamente lo atenderemos y
canalizaremos su caso.

settings.title: ¿Por qué mi pedido llega en varios envíos?
settings.text:
Su pedido pudiera llegar en varios envíos dependiendo de la disponibilidad del producto o del almacén donde se encuentra. Nuestro propósito es que reciba sus
productos lo más rápido posible.

settings.title: ¿Qué pasa si mi pedido entregado está dañado?
settings.text: En caso de presentarse cualquier defecto de funcionamiento se activará la garantía que ofrece el fabricante.

settings.title: ¿Por qué hay un cargo en mi tarjeta si mi pedido fue cancelado?
settings.text:
El banco puede presentar algún retraso en el procesamiento del reverso de la transacción. Sin embargo, de nuestra parte procesamos las cancelaciones al
momento de que ocurren por lo que el reverso de la operación está garantizado.

settings.title: ¿Cómo puedo rastrear mi pedido?
settings.text: Una vez realizada la compra usted recibirá de parte de nuestros agentes de atención al cliente la guía de despacho para que pueda rastrear su producto dentro de las plataformas de las compañías de envíos.

settings.title: ¿Qué métodos de pago puedo utilizar para mis compras en innovar.com.ve?
settings.text: Tenemos a su disposición nuestra plataforma de pago donde podrá utilizar sus tarjetas de crédito y/o débito internacionales, PayPal y transferencias bancarias en bolívares o moneda extranjera.

settings.title: ¿Cómo realizo el pago en línea?
settings.text:
Usted desde la comodidad de su casa, oficina o desde el carro puede utilizar nuestra portal de pago donde de forma rápida y sencilla, podrá pagar sus compras con su
tarjeta de crédito o débito internacional.

settings.title: ¿Cómo agrego artículos a mi bolsa de compras?
settings.text:
Seleccione el producto de su preferencia. Una vez seleccionado con solo hacer click en la
opción “Agregar al Carrito” este será incluido en su bolsa de compras. Puede seguir agregando productos hasta que haya finalizado su compra.

settings.title: ¿Cómo puedo obtener códigos promocionales y descuentos especiales?
settings.text: En nuestra página web encontrará códigos promociones y descuentos especiales que puede utilizar al momento de procesar su compra.

settings.title: ¿Cuáles son mis opciones de entrega y envío en INNOVAR?
settings.text: Los envíos serán realizados entre 3 y 5 días después de la confirmación del pago. Hacemos entregas a nivel nacional y el costo de envío está incluido en la compra. Algunas excepciones pueden aplicarse.

settings.title: ¿Me cobrarán varios envíos?
settings.text: Si su pedido es igual o superior a $50, su envío es totalmente gratis. Sin embargo, algunas excepciones aplican.

settings.title: ¿Qué pasa si tengo un problema con mi entrega?
settings.text: Tenemos a su disposición el correo electrónico contacto@innovar.com.ve donde gustosamente lo atenderemos y canalizaremos su caso.

settings.title: ¿Cuál es la política de devoluciones de INNOVAR?
settings.text:
Todas las solicitudes serán recibidas y atendidas por nuestro equipo de Servicio al Cliente a través de nuestro correo contacto@innovar.com.ve
1. Falla de Producto (producto con características o colores distintos a las ofrecidos).
2. El producto debe ser devuelto en las mismas condiciones (empaque, etiquetas, sellos), tal cual fue recibido. Al momento de realizar el cambio se debe presentar la factura o comprobante de pago respectivo.

No se aceptan devoluciones por daños sufridos en el (los) producto(s) comprado(s) una vez el cliente se haya recibido conforme, en caso contrario debe notificar en un lapso no mayor a 24 horas luego de haber recibido el (los) producto(s).

No se realizan reembolsos por las compras realizadas.

settings.title: Envios y devoluciones
settings.subheading: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Cras ac magna eu tortor dictum suscipit vitae sed ipsum. Mauris nec ullamcorper diam. Etiam non commodo lorem.

settings.text1:
Shipping cost

Shipping cost is calculated on a "per order," "per item" or "per pound" basis and is based on the shipping option you select. We sometimes offer free shipping for specific shipping options in select categories, or free shipping sitewide.

Shipping timing

You can see each product's estimated arrival date on the product page and during the checkout process. During checkout, you can choose an estimated arrival date from the options provided. Entering your shipping destination ZIP code or allowing BestBuy.com to use your current location can result in greater accuracy for your estimated arrival date. Certain products may require additional days to process prior to shipping. This will be reflected in the estimated arrival date. If for some reason you don't receive your product, you may be eligible for a replacement product if you notify us during your return and exchange time period.

PO boxes: Please note that based on size, weight or supplier restrictions, some products cannot be shipped to, or may be delayed when shipped to, a PO box address. If you stipulate a PO box as the shipping address for one of these items, you will see a shipping alert in your cart, where alternative options will be provided.
settings.text2:
Can I ship items in the same order to multiple addresses?

If you order two or more different items, you can choose separate shipping addresses and shipping methods (Standard, Two Day, One Day or Same Day) for each. During checkout, specify the shipping address and method for each item. If you want to ship multiple quantities of the same item to separate shipping addresses, you'll need to place separate orders.
settings.text3:
Free next-day delivery on thousands of items.

Next-day delivery for qualifying products is based on product availability and on the time of day the order is placed. $35 minimum purchase is required and applies to ship-to-home items after coupons and before taxes. ($35 minimum does not apply to My Best Buy Elite and Elite Plus members.) $35 minimum does not include digital downloads, e-gift cards, special orders, and any items canceled or removed from the order. Next-day delivery limitations may apply for Thanksgiving week, select promotional periods and weekend orders. Sunday delivery not available. Size and weight restrictions apply. Major appliances, 51" or larger TVs, and other scheduled delivery items have different delivery terms.

Free standard shipping on orders $35 and up.

On qualifying items, free shipping will be noted on the product page and in your Cart, along with an estimated date of arrival. The $35 order total is after coupons and before taxes, and does not include select digital downloads, e-gift cards, special orders, scheduled delivery items, and any items canceled or removed from the order.

settings.text1:
Some items require scheduled delivery due to their size and weight. These items include major appliances, TVs 51" class or larger, and furniture. Confirm in advance that an adult, age 18 or over (19 or over in AL or NE, 21 in Puerto Rico), with a valid government issued photo ID is available during the duration of the appointment.

Delivery details

You’ll get an appointment window for when your order will be delivered on your scheduled date. If your appointment window is 6 hours or more, we’ll contact you by 9 p.m. the night before with a narrower time window. Once we contact you with the narrower window, your appointment is locked and we’re unable to change the estimated arrival time. Includes delivering your product to the room of your choice. Appliances will be unboxed and the packaging will be disposed of. TVs will not be removed from the shipping box.

Special order delivery

Special order items are part of our expanded online selection and are not available in Best Buy stores. If your product qualifies for special order delivery, it will be called out within Cart as you are purchasing your product online.

1. An agent will call you in 2–7 business days to schedule your delivery.

2. Please make sure the phone number you provide during checkout is correct so we can properly schedule your delivery date.

3. Delivery timelines may be longer than for non-special order products.

4. Item will be delivered into the entryway of the home or garage only.

Delivery with installation

If you select Delivery with Installation during checkout, we will connect your new purchase and have it ready to use when we leave. Installation is not available for all products and may require additional fees along with the purchase of specific accessories or parts needed to make these connections.
settings.text2:
What is same-day delivery?

Now you can place an order on BestBuy.com and get it delivered the same day. Same-day delivery is available 7 days a week, for both residential and business customers in select areas and ZIP codes.

How do I place an order for same-day delivery?

Same-day orders can only be placed online at BestBuy.com. If the products are eligible and you order before 1 p.m. local time, you will see same-day delivery as an option in checkout. If you order after the deadline, you will see tomorrow as an option in checkout.

What if I am not available when the delivery partner arrives?

For residential deliveries, if our delivery partner attempts delivery, but you are not available, and they cannot find a safe place to leave your order, they may try to contact you at the phone number provided during checkout. For business deliveries, someone must be available to receive the order. Our delivery partner may try to contact you at the phone number provided during checkout.

If the delivery is not able to be completed, your order will be returned to the store, and a full refund of your order and shipping costs will be completed within 24 hours of it being returned.

What if I don't receive my delivery?

Check the tracking link in your shipping confirmation email or log in to your BestBuy.com account to check the status of your order.

1. If the product is showing as delivered, be sure our delivery provider didn’t leave the product in a hidden location.

2. If you are still unable to find your order, call 1-888-BEST BUY (1-888-237-8289) for help. Please have your order number ready for faster service.

3. If our delivery provider was unable to deliver your order, the tracking link will show Returned Back to Sender. The product will be returned to the store and your payment will be refunded within 24 hours.

settings.text1:
Store Pickup lets you buy items online and pick them up in a store. You avoid shipping and scheduled delivery charges — and you may be able to get your order faster.

Here's how it works:

1. During checkout, choose Store Pickup and select your store.

2. We'll show you an estimated pickup date.

3. Place your order and wait to receive a "Ready for pickup" email (this is a separate email from your order confirmation).

4. Bring your ID, credit card and order number to the store and pick up your items.

5. We'll hold your items at the store for 5 days; if you don't make it in by then, we'll cancel the order and refund your method of payment.

6. If you can’t pick up your order within 5 days and you don’t want it to be canceled, check your order details for extended pickup options.

Bring to the store:

1. Your government-issued photo ID.

2. The credit card used for the purchase (if a credit card was used).

3. Your order number.

At the store:

1. Some stores have reserved parking spaces for Store Pickup — they're right up front.

2. Inside, look for the Store Pickup sign at the front of the store, or ask the Blue Shirt at the door to point you in the right direction.

A few more things to know:

1. There’s no charge for Store Pickup.

2. Products may be larger than expected due to their packaging; please keep this in mind when considering what vehicle you use to pick up your order.

3. Allow extra time to pick up large items like TVs and appliances.

4. If you used a new Best Buy Credit Card to pay for your order, but haven’t yet received the card in the mail, just let the store associate know.

5. Virtual and one-time-use credit cards cannot be used for Store Pickup.

If you want to return or exchange your purchase, please know that the time period begins the day you receive your product and applies to new, clearance, open-box, refurbished and pre-owned products.

Most products: 15 days

Cell phones and tablets: 15 days

Major appliances: 15 days
settings.text2:
Return at a store

You may return any item purchased on BestBuy.com at any Best Buy store. For faster return processing, please bring your packing slip (if you received one), or your receipt, the credit card used to make your purchase, and a valid photo ID. If local regulations have prohibited us from re-opening your local store, you may return your item(s) via our curbside service.

Use our prepaid return label

You will get free shipping on your return by using our pre-paid label. Log in to your Best Buy account to locate your order. Print a prepaid shipping label. Put the return label on the package and take it to an authorized UPS drop off location. Some exclusions apply.
settings.title3: How to return a major appliance
settings.text3: We want you to be satisfied with your purchase from us. Before you accept delivery of your major appliance, please inspect it. If any issue exists, you may refuse delivery. Once you have accepted delivery (or if you brought the major appliance home yourself), you have 15 days to contact us regarding defects, damage or other issues. Please do not contact the store. Please call 1-800-304-1259 between 8 a.m.–9 p.m. CT, 7 days a week.
settings.text4:
With a few exceptions, we will reimburse you for returned items in the same way you paid for them. If you prefer, you can make an exchange for the same item.

For returns by mail, once we receive your return, we will process it within 7–15 business days. Depending on your bank's processing time, it may take up to 7 days after we process the return to reflect on your account.

If you paid more than $800 in cash or more than $250 by check or by a debit card without a major credit card logo, we will refund you by check within 10 business days. Any amounts deducted from a gift card will be credited to the gift card. If you no longer have the gift card used for an order, please call us at 1-888-BEST BUY (1-888-237-8289) with your order number handy, and we'll be happy to send you a replacement.

settings.text: Free shipping
Hassle-free returns
